snippet: FOLEY--Rita. The board and staff of HealthCare Chaplaincy Network are deeply saddened by the death of Rita Foley, a dedicated and long-time member of our board of directors. Rita's commitment to our mission -- to integrate spiritual care into health care -- inspired us all. Our deepest sympathy to Rita's children, Michael and Nathaniel Buckley; her sister, Patricia Di Silvio; her brother, Michael Foley. Michael H. Schoen, Chair of the Board Rev. Eric J. Hall, President and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: FOLEY--Rita. The board and staff of HealthCare Chaplaincy Network are deeply saddened by the death of Rita Foley, a dedicated and long-time member of our board of directors. Rita's commitment to our mission -- to integrate spiritual care into health care -- inspired us all. Our deepest sympathy to Rita's children, Michael and Nathaniel Buckley; her sister, Patricia Di Silvio; her brother, Michael Foley. Michael H. Schoen, Chair of the Board Rev. Eric J. Hall, President and CEO 1/3
